page.title: 20Credits page.
page.content: Co-ordinating all the work was a panel of teachers comprising: Mrs. Goulder (Kyson), Mr. Gourlay (St. Mary's), Miss Johnson (St.M.), Mrs. Jones (St.M.), Mr. Marshall (County) & Mr. Sutton (County) Groups of Parents, too numerous to mention individually, also helped with the field work and surveying. The children came from the following classes: County - Classes 5 and 6 Kyson - Units 5 & 6 St. Mary's - Classes Jnr 2 & 3. Many local people helped by giving their time in order to be interviewed by the children. For their help - we thank them. Finally - thank you, B.B.C. for giving us the opportunity to re-discover our locality and contribute to the{ {Domesday Project. September 15th 1985.
